content: HDA-TF Undercut anchor Ultimate-performance through-set undercut anchor for dynamic loads (sherardized steel) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Combines the advantages of a post-installed mechanical anchor, i.e. flexibility and immediate loading, with the performance of a cast-in-place headed stud Close spacing and small edge distances thanks to very low expansion forces Self-undercutting facilitates fast and reliable installation â€“ no separate undercutting tool or handling needed The resulting keying effect helps to provide a secure hold in cracked concrete under dynamic loading Manufactured under the NQA-1 nuclear quality program Applications Safety-relevant, heavy-duty fastenings for all dynamic loading in cracked or uncracked concrete, including applications in nuclear power plants Examples: supports for heavy pipes, safety barriers, industrial machines, crane rails, dorm structures, crash barriers, roof fixings, elevator tracks, bridge retrofitting etc. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, HDG (Hot-Dip Galvanized)/Sherardized Head configuration: Externally threaded PROFIS Software: No Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, HDG (Hot-Dip Galvanized)/Sherardized | Head configuration | Externally threaded | PROFIS Software | No | Type of fixing | Through-fastening ### ITEMS- 412903 - Undercut anchor HDA-TF 20-M10x100/20 - Package Size 12 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDA-TF M10/20 qc Undercut anchor assy - 412905 - Undercut anchor HDA-TF 22-M12x125/50 - Package Size 8 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDA-TF M12/50 qc Undercut anchor assy
